entry.title: It's the end of the world
entry.summary:
All things must come to an end, even the entire world.
On the 31st of July, Liberty Land will be no more.

Thank you for playing.
bb

entry.title: I'm not dead yet!
entry.summary: Hey girls and boys. George here. I'm just posting to let you know that I'm not dead yet. I've just been very extra super busy with personal stuff. I've been keeping an eye on the server just to be sure it's not crashed or something like that, but I haven't had the time to do anything else. Some of you have written e-mails. I'm going to reply now. Sorry for disappearing like this. I'm still going to quite busy for a while but I'll try not to dissappear.

entry.title: Emergency Maintenance 2014-12-18
entry.summary: We've ran into some trouble with the database and we're working on resolving the issue. At this point we expect it will take several hours until we're back online. We're trying to keep data loss to a minimum. The worst case scenario is no more than 6 hours of lost data. We'll post as soon as we have news.

entry.title: Liberty Land map expaneded
entry.summary: Just wanted to let you all know, I've expanded the map so you can now see a little over 4500 nodes in all directions.

entry.title: Planned Maintenance at 2014-10-07 06:00 UTC
entry.summary: We need to bring the server down for maintenance again. It shouldn't take more than an hour. Specifically, the server will be down for approximately 1 hour starting at 06:00 UTC Tuesday, 2014-10-07.

entry.title: Planned Maintenance at 2014-10-04 07:00 UTC
entry.summary: We've been investigating an issue that causes the server to lag. As part of the troubleshooting I will need to bring the server down for a while on Saturday. Specifically, the server will be down for approximately 1 hour starting at 07:00 UTC Saturday, 2014-10-04.

entry.title: Mobs are Live!
entry.summary:
Animals and monsters now inhabit Liberty Land

During the day, you will encounter some frindly animals. You can be frinds with them, or you can kill them. I don't care either way. But be careful though! During the night and in the dark, there are monsters. You can't be friends with them, they will try to kill you.

Craft your sword and get ready to fight!

entry.title: Worldmap is Live!
entry.summary: I am very happy to announce, we now have an amazing interactive map of Liberty Land which you can see at maps.ayntest.net.

entry.title: Planned Maintenance at 2014-09-04 05:00 UTC
entry.summary: Our super awesome admin, sol, needs to do some h4x0r computer magic on our game server to make it more amazing. As a result, the server will be down for approximately 3 hours starting at 05:00 UTC tomorrow, 2014-09-04.

entry.title: some downtime
entry.summary: We are experiencing some problems with our db. We're not going anywhere, but it might take a while.
